scripts.cy:santa-1:prod:chrome:dashboard: npx cypress run --config-file cypress-prod.config.js --spec cypress/e2e/santa-1.cy.js --browser chrome --record --key dfd323b2-baf8-4830-827c-a313a25ae33b
scripts.cy:santa-2:prod:electron:dashboard: npx cypress run --config-file cypress-prod.config.js --spec cypress/e2e/santa-2.cy.js --browser electron --record --key dfd323b2-baf8-4830-827c-a313a25ae33b
scripts.cy:prod:chrome-electron:dashboard: npm run cy:santa-1:prod:chrome:dashboard && npm run cy:santa-2:prod:electron:dashboard
